name: draw_loan
attributes: # [doc = " 担保を元に貸出を行うが、"]
# [doc = " loan_account.collateral_owner と ctx.accounts.borrower.key() の一致検証がない"]
body: let loan = & mut ctx . accounts . loan_account ;
* * ctx . accounts . program_vault . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () -= draw_amount ;
* * ctx . accounts . borrower . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () += draw_amount ;

fields.name: loan_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = collateral_owner)] を指定して"] # [doc = " loan_account.collateral_owner と borrower.key() を検証すべき"]

fields.name: program_vault
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ローン原資を保管するプログラムの Vault"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: borrower
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 借入を行うユーザー（署名者）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: collateral_owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来この担保で借入を許可されるべきユーザーの Pubkey"]

fields.name: draw_count
fields.attribute: # [doc = " これまでに引き出しを行った回数"]
